docs.text: Welcome to the d'Alembert Institute This is an Unofficial guide to things you might need during your stay at IJLRA. Check the d'Alembert Wiki if you find it lacking. To make things easier on your first day, fill in the online form 2 weeks before you show up.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This is an Unofficial guide to things you might need during your stay at IJLRA. Check the d'Alembert Wiki if you find it lacking. To make things easier on your first day, fill in the online form 2 weeks before you show up.
docs.title: Welcome to the d'Alembert Institute

docs.text: IJLRA ( website ) Your administrator They will help you when you're lost. You'll find them at the 5th floor, corridor 44-54. Check which team you're in to know who to look for: Olivier Labbey (FCIH) Catherine Dejancourt (MISES) Sandrine Bandeira (LAM) Evelyne Mignon (CEPT et MPIA) Office and Key Ask your N+1 where is your office. Send a mail to Olivier Labbey asking if you can have a key. Upon notification that your key is ready: (optional) Call the key office to check that they're open: 01 44 27 38 75 . Go get your key, taking either ID card or passport with you. Email account D'Alembert account Your primary email address, of the form username@dalembert.upmc.fr . Ask the IT department for a D'Alembert account Connect to the online mail client Sorbonne account A secondary email address that is useful to access University related services. Mails sent to this address will (should) automatically be redirected to your D'Alembert account. Once you have a D'Alembert email Send a mail to Simona Otarasanu or go and see her: corridor 44/54, 5th floor, office 510. Annuaire UPMC @todo Email Clients You'll need your Annuaire UPMC account information to setup your email client. From there, setup with email client with: IMAP incoming mail server with the ID and password used to connect to d'Alembert online mail client , using heywood.dalembert.upmc.fr as host. SMTP outgoing mail server with your Annuaire UPMC ID and password, using smtps.upmc.fr as host. Check the D'Alembert Wiki for additional information. Printers Follow instructions on the d'Alembert Wiki . Internet Wired Find your computer and/or internet hub mac address . Send a mail to the IT department or go and see them: corridor 55/65, 5th floor, office 507. Ask if your device can be enabled on the lab network. Wireless Connect to eduroam with your Annuaire UPMC ID and password. Access ssh Create a public/private pair of ssh keys. Send a mail to the IT department asking if you can be granted access to the lab via ssh on vauban.dalembert.upmc.fr or chagall.dalembert.upmc.fr . Lab intranet Send a mail to the IT department asking for an intranet account. Room reservation You'll need an access to the lab intranet Connect to the lab room reservation service with your d'Alembert intranet ID and password. Crous (restaurant) You'll need an account on the Annuaire UPMC to get an account at the university restaurant. Go to the Crous building (see map on home page) with your account ID and an ID card or passport. (optional) Install the Izly app on your smartphone. Software Check the list of software distributed by Sorbonne University.

docs.text: IJLRA / LAM / Espaces Sonores ( website ) DropSU DropSU is the Dropbox used by the group. To get a DropSU account: @todo Remote computers To connect to the computers in Sabine from outside the lab, follow the instructions at Miles/Themes/SonEspace/Utilities/remote-desktop.txt using the information at Miles/Themes/SonEspace/Utilities/list-computers.txt . Shared calendar Send a mail to Brian Katz asking for an invitation to the shared group calendar.
docs.title: IJLRA / LAM / Espaces Sonores

docs.text: DropSU is the Dropbox used by the group. To get a DropSU account: @todo

docs.text: IJLRA / LAM ( website ) Miles (NAS) Miles is the LAM team NAS. Account To get an account on Miles: Send a mail to Brian Katz asking for an account Connect to Miles http interface Access Instructions to mount Miles as a network drive are available at Miles/Themes/SonEspace/Utilities/access-miles.txt . Time machine Instructions to setup a time machine backup on Miles are available at Miles/Themes/SonEspace/Utilities/time-machine-miles.txt . Team Intranet Send a mail to Pascal Lesaec , from the IT department, to get acces to the LAM intranet. Shared calendar Send a mail to Brian Katz asking for an invitation to the shared team calendar. Room reservation Anechoic room Ask for a spot using the Anechoic room platform website . Other rooms Use the shared team calendar to book the "Salle piano", "Salle nouvelle lutheries" or "MocapVR".
docs.title: IJLRA / LAM
